content: chicken and turkey coaster crochet pattern please add this crochet pattern to your ravelry favorites ***free pattern link *** https //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2023/11/chicken-and-turkey-coasters-crochet html ***video link *** https //youtu be/gki_-rerxu4 si=sbzjdgc5z_yhkzx9 skill easy materials crochet hook h / 5 00 mm yarn med 4 acrylic or cotton small amount of red orange black for chicken cream 1 oz for turkey light brown - 5 oz fall variegated - 5 oz yarn needle stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet skip skip space space change to chgto size 5 5 x 6 inches notes ch1 does not count as a st ch3 counts as a double_crochet
